content: Leaks reveal the new shoes will come in three stylesKanye West is reportedly set to release three new Yeezy 700 V2s later this year. Leaked images of what are alleged to be the shoes in question have appeared online, showing details of the different styles. According to The Sole Supplier, photos posted by Instagram user @seabass_photos – which appear to have been deleted – show that the new line will include the Blue Water style, which features shades of blue and grey. It will also feature the darker Blue Water 2.0, and Real Cement, which is similar to the Cement shoe that is also rumoured to drop soon.The new styles are said to be scheduled for release around Autumn/Winter 2019. They will make up just three of over 20 trainer releases West is reportedly planning this year.Meanwhile, the rapper recently helped to raise money for a mental health charity through a series of Yeezy pop-up lemonade stands. The stalls sold pairs of his unreleased sneakers, the Yeezy Boost 7000 V2 Geode. All proceeds were given to the National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI), as confirmed by Kim Kardashian West on Twitter. West is working on his long-awaited album ‘Yandhi’, which was originally due for release in September. The star pushed the release date back to November before scrapping that plan too. No concrete release date has been given since.
